## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withHeader() method

Define a component header.

**Signature:**


## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the header |
|  header | HeaderObject \| ReferenceObject | Specification of the header |
